AI Description: ProteinOrtho is a versatile standalone tool for detecting orthologous proteins across multiple species. It generates ortholog groups based on pairwise comparison of proteins and supports different orthology definitions for accurate ortholog detection.
Core Features:
1. Detects orthologous proteins in multiple species
2. Supports different orthology definitions
3. Performs pairwise protein comparisons for accurate ortholog detection
4. Can handle large-scale datasets efficiently
5. Provides options for customization and parameter tuning
